Docs.summary: Returns a string that represents this matrix.
Docs.returns: The string representation of this matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The numeric values in the returned string are formatted by using the conventions of the current culture. For example, for the en-US culture, the returned string might appear as `{ {M11:1.1 M12:1.2} {M21:2.1 M22:2.2} {M31:3.1 M32:3.2} }`.
